short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Interact with your leads, franchisees, and contacts from within your Gmail inbox using FranConnect Sky for Gmail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FranConnect Where You Work! More and more, businesses are turning to the G Suite to support their email and document management needs. With FranConnect Sky for Gmail, you will be able to interact with your leads, franchisees, and contacts from your FranConnect Sky system right from within your Gmail inbox.

- Real-time tracking of prospect and customer interactions 
- Automatically enrich contact information based on email address 
- Ensures all employees keep system of record current with latest sales efforts 
- Easily create contacts and leads directly from within Gmail
